name: NFC Transfer
description: Application uses android beam to transfer files between android devices.  Files can be of any format, you can use any of your favorite file browser applications to choose files.  Application is having a very basic UI, enhancements are on its way.  Application do not restrict you to have same application installed in sharing devices. All you need is a Android Beam Supporting device.  Share your files directly from any application over NFC. (* Support from application is mandatory )
